page.title: 08Farming 1
page.content: Primarily cereals:beans and sugar beet are grown on lighter soils.On small holdings animal husbandry prevails. 4 farms were selected,3 cereals,1stock. GESYNS FARM.226.3 Hectares.1984: 149.1Ha winter wheat,32.9Ha winter barley,10.7Ha spring barley,18.9Ha winter beans 4.0Ha woodland/cover. Varieties of cereals are changed annually but some- times repeated. Various sprays are used to combat prevalent diseases.Fields are ploughed annually.Land type & economics influence crop choice.Three men are employed on this well equipped farm. Information on all crops & treatment is filed & updated annually.This farm has a conservation policy;hedges are retained & trees planted. This farm is equipped & responsible for snow clearance in the parish.
